chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now as soon as you put IMG,  both SRC and Alt are its required attributes.  In fact, it will work even if you do not write Alt.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But it is recommended.  I will tell you what happens with these two attributes.  First of all, if you write in SRC,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: image.png.  You can see this image is here.  So this image.png.

chunks.text: And I put train image in Alt.  Okay.  Now if I show it to you by previewing in the browser,

chunks.text: then see how it looks.  This is our page and this is the train image.  What happened by doing this?

chunks.text: Where did the Alt that we wrote go?  You can say.  I will tell you where it went.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The thing we put in Alt.  So see the thing we put in Alt,  we did not see it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Assume for some reason,  the server cannot show you the image.  Okay.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then what will happen?  Assume I wrote image2 by mistake.  Now there is no file named image2.png here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you can put Alt in the image like this.  What will happen if I don't put Alt?  If I don't put Alt,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then the Alt text that was coming,  will not come.  Nothing else will happen.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So you don't want that when error comes in your server,  then the user sees this image.  You want that something like this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the scenario should be made.  The user should see something like this.  Train image is written here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: See it like this.  Okay.  I hope you understood this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So the image is very straightforward.  It has two more attributes,  which are very important.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: One is width.  Which is width in pixels.  If I say 23,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: width is equal to,  then you can see.  In fact, I will correct the image first.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I wrote image2 by mistake.  Image.png is here.  So here you can see,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have taken 23 pixels.  Which is very small.  So I will make it 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You don't need to write px in this.  When we write width in CSS,  then we will see that we need to write px there.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here we just write width is equal to,  in double quotes.  As you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay.  So if I bring it here,  then you see,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that we have seen this small image.  If I give its height too.  I mean, I give its height too.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I say, if you keep its height 230,  then its aspect ratio will also get reduced.  So it will get a little stretched.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Because what it did,  it made its width 230,  and made its height 230.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.  Now if you want its height to be 230,  and width to be automatically adjusted,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: then you just use the height attribute.  Now remove the width one here.  So its height will be 230 pixels.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And as much as it can go in width,  it will go.  It will be automatically adjusted.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now see,  it got automatically adjusted in width.  And in height, it took this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now what happens is,  that width and height can be adjusted through CSS.  And we will see in the CSS section,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that why should we always set this width and height.  We should always set one thing from width and height.  Such that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: when our page is loading,  then our image inside the page,  doesn't come suddenly in the page.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you,  in the coming videos.  But now you understand this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that these attributes of width and height,  I have heard many people saying that,  that they have been deprecated,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and they should not be used now.  But I say,  they should be used for SEO purpose.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Why should they be used?  I will tell you in the coming videos,  where I will tell you about Core Web Vitals and SEO.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: For now, you understand that width,  gives width to the image.  Gives height to the height image.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If you put one of the two,  then the other one automatically gets set.  And these values are in pixels,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and you don't have to write px or pixel.  You just have to write this number.  And that's it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is an attribute,  height,  and an src attribute,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and an alt attribute.  You can use style attribute in this.  In fact, you can use style attribute,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with almost all the tags.  So this was about the image.  Now we will talk about tables in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Table tag is very useful in HTML.  I will tell you what happens with table tag.  You get to see a table from table tag.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now I copy this table from here,  and when I copy this table from here,  then you will see,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: my page will look something like this.  So this is the HTML table.  Where is my preview page?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Here it is.  Look here, name,  Harry, age 100.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay.  Now if I put a lot of things here,  let's say I put something like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Let's say I put name,  and here I put,  let's say,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: designation.  Let's say I put Harry's designation as programmer.  And let's say I want to put more things.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will use Alt Shift Bottom Arrow key.  I will use Alt Shift Bottom Arrow key.  And here let's say,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want to write,  that,  favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And I want to write here,  let's say,  JavaScript.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay.  And now you see here,  that this table will be made like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Name,  destination,  favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay.  So what is this?  How does it work?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you.  So here you see,  we used table tag.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Table tag has a TR tag,  which is table row.  What will come in this row?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You will get to see this.  Now if you want to use this as a table heading,  you say that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: this is my table row,  that means this is this row.  In which name,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: destination,  and your favorite language is written.  What will come in this row?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And what will come?  What will that be?  Here you can see,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that it will be a heading.  So that's why I will use TH.  TH means table heading.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And we will write it only once.  So in the first TR,  we will write TH.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Once we put the heading on top,  then after that we will put data.  So we will put TD in the table row,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which stands for table data.  And here you will put all the rows in the TR,  what will happen?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Your rows will keep adding.  So here,  let's say I write SAM.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And this is also a programmer.  And let's say this is Java,  its favorite language.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So these rows will keep adding  under the table.  You can see here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that these rows are adding,  and are being added.  We will see from CSS,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how it can be given a border,  it can be styled.  But this default looks like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And yes, I know it is ugly.  But you guys just understand,  that the table works like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now there are row span and call span attributes.  Now you will see here,  that the meaning of row span is,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how many rows will be spanned by your TD.  For example,  let's say I write here,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I want SAM and programmer,  earlier we were taking one cell,  SAM was taking one cell,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and programmer was taking one cell.  I want to write SAM in two cells.  So I don't want to write programmer,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I just want to write SAM.  And I want to write here,  that call span is equal to 2.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So call span is equal to 2 means,  that SAM will now take the place of two columns.  What does it mean?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: SAM will now take the place of two columns.  That is, SAM will be shown like this.  I will show you.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Something like this.  So it took the place of this whole column.  Okay?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So the call span means,  how many columns will be spanned.  By default, only one cell will be spanned.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But sometimes one cell will be spanned by two columns.  To demonstrate this,  I will explain to you from Excel.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In Excel, you understand that,  this is a table of our HTML.  Sometimes I would like,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that it spans two columns,  one data.  So here we use the merge cell.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And let's say I write SAM here.  In HTML, this thing is done,  using call span.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Sometimes we also want,  that we merge vertically.  Let's say I want to merge these two cells.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: There we use row span.  And with whom will we use row span?  We will use row span,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: with TD, obviously.  Okay?  So with TD, we were using call span,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and we were using row span.  If we use row span,  then it will span two rows like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay?  So I hope you understood this thing.  And when we make tables,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and projects in HTML,  then you will understand better.  But I will show you row span here quickly.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What happens?  So if I write here,  row span is equal to 2.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And after this, I will write one more TR here.  So you will see,  that my table is looking like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now to explain this better,  I will put a CSS style here.  What I will do here?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will add a style sheet.  And I am going to name this style sheet,  style.css.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So in style.css,  and you don't need to understand CSS right now.  I will tell you already.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will write in TD,  border, 2px, solid black.  And I will tell you all this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: how it works.  But for now, you understand,  that I have put this,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: to explain to you.  So I said,  that in this row,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: there will be Harry, programmer and JavaScript.  Then I said,  that this Sam,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: what will be its row span?  Where did I give 2 rows span?  First I said,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that my Java,  its row span will be 2.  So how many rows will Java take?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Obviously 2.  Okay?  So here Java will take 2 rows.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So here you can see,  Java has taken 2 rows.  So when Java has taken 2 rows,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: it means I don't have to write Java in the next one.  Because its row has already been filled.  So I won't write Java in the next one.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Okay?  So you see,  I won't write Java here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I did its col span 2,  and its row span 2.  So what happened by doing this?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see,  it was Harry, programmer and JavaScript.  Then I said,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: that its Sam,  its col span will be 2.  That means it will take 2 columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This Sam will also take 2 columns.  And this Java will take 2 rows.  So you can see,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: exactly the same thing happened here.  It took 2 rows,  and it took 2 columns.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So in this way,  row span and col span can be used,  in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In HTML table,  we can also add captions.  And to add captions,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: we can use some caption tag like this.  So I will show you,  if we use caption in HTML table,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: student details,  or I will say employee details.  So your page will look like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: You can see here,  that the caption of employee details,  will be added here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now with CSS,  it can also be changed,  its font,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: its font size.  But for now,  by default,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: it looks like this.  The caption comes up.  You will see employee details like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that,  you can also give header and footer.  You can give T head and T foot here.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Like if I put some content,  in T head and T foot.  Something like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If I put header here,  and if I put footer here,  then you will get to see T head and T foot,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: like this.  You can see here,  header and footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will tell you about one more tag,  which is called BR tag,  which adds line break.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So after image,  a line break will come here.  You can see everything is down.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So this is header.  And after this,  I will obviously add footer down.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will not add it here.  So I will add it after my entire table,  at the end.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So this is my table footer.  Now I can change this with CSS.  Now here I will give my header,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: and footer content,  which I can group with T head and T foot,  like this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So what will be the header of my table?  This is what I have written here,  TH.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can group this.  I can put it in T head.  Along with that,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: the content inside the table,  will come inside T body.  So what will come inside T body?

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Something like this,  my table content will come.  As you can see.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And after this,  if I write T foot here,  and I want to add some data at the end.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So I will add one more TR.  As you can see,  I will right click and document it.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So it will be a better format.  Suppose I want to put this type of TR,  and I want to group it in T foot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So this is just a way to group.  That is, I have put it inside T foot.  Some TRs,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have put inside T body,  which is my main body.  And I have put it inside T head,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: which is my table header.  And obviously,  nothing will change with this.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I have just grouped it.  Look here,  our,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will do one thing,  I will write footer here,  so that you can know that it is a footer.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I will write foot here.  And you can see here,  that the last row is foot.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now what is the point of doing this?  We have just grouped it,  so that we can target it ahead of CSS.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So you will use this very little.  But you can do grouping like this.  Your whole table,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: head content will come here,  foot content will come here.  And body content,

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: in fact,  comes in between head and foot.  But you can write it here in any way.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML
chunks.text: But ideally,  head,  body,
